title: Шоумаскгоон
overview: A new original musical show, the heroes of which are those who have already won more than once and proved that he is the best: it brought together on one stage the favorite participants of popular NTV projects - "Mask", "You are super ! and " Superstar! ". In "Showmaskgoon" they had to fight again for the love of the audience and once again show what each of them is capable of.
